brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to test whether non-invasive brain stimulation, such as
      Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (TMS) may alleviate pain associated with various chronic
      pain conditions. We will test various methods of TMS to identify a treatment approach that
      may reduce the symptoms of chronic pain for the patient.

clinical_study.brief_title: Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation for Low Back Pain

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Age 18 or older

          -  Patient with Chronic Low Back Pain

          -  Meets minimum pain level criteria

          -  Ability to perform the experimental Task and Procedures

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  MRI contraindication if an MRI exam is required per protocol

          -  TMS Contraindication

          -  History of a psychological or psychiatric disorder that would interfere with study
             procedures, at the discretion of the researcher.

          -  Neurologic illness that would interfere with brain integrity

          -  Current medical condition or medication use that would interfere with study
             procedures or data integrity, at the discretion of the researcher.

          -  Currently pregnant or planning to become pregnant.

          -  On going legal action or disability claim.

clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Applicaitons of Non-Invasive Brain Stimulation for the Treatment of Chronic Pain

primary_outcome.description: Compared to baseline pain report as provided by Visual Analogue Scale (VAS)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline Compared to each treatmeant series (at 4 weeks, 8 weeks, and 12 weeks)

primary_outcome.description: As compared to baseline worst daily pain report provided on visual analogue scale (VAS)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline Compared to each treatment series (at 4 weeks, 8 weeks, and 12 weeks)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Treatment
